page.title: 11 EMPLOYMENT
page.content: MANY TRADITIONAL EMPLOYERS HAVE CLOSED DOWN AND OTHERS CUT BACK THEIR EMPLOYEES,SO UNEMPLOYMENT IS QUITE HIGH MAIN EMPLOYERS ARE PAPER MILLS, FACTORIES,SHOPS AND SERVICES IN GRAVESEND ITSELF.MANY PEOPLE TRAVEL TO LONDON TO WORK-GOING BY TRAINOR COACH. UNEMPLOYMENT IS ESPECIALLY HIGH AMONGST SCHOOL LEAVERS,ALTHOUGH MANY GO TO WORK EXPERIENCE SCHEMES.IN OUR CLASS THE MAIN WAGE EARNER IN EACH FAMILY WORK AS: 25% UNEMPLOYED, 42% MANAGERIAL, 30% FACTORIES OR PAPER MILLS, 25% SERVICES. REST-VARIOUS PART TIME JOBS.
